definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="block_energy_get"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">public class ChlorophyteAcceleratorOnTickUpdateProcedure {&#10;    public static void execute(LevelAccessor world, double x, double y, double z) {&#10;        int radius = 5; // how far around the block to boost growth&#10;&#10;        for (int dx = -radius; dx <= radius; dx++) {&#10;            for (int dz = -radius; dz <= radius; dz++) {&#10;                for (int dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++) { // check slightly above/below&#10;                    BlockPos targetPos = BlockPos.containing(x + dx, y + dy, z + dz);&#10;                    BlockState state = world.getBlockState(targetPos);&#10;&#10;                    // Crops (wheat, carrots, potatoes, beetroot)&#10;                    if (state.getBlock() instanceof CropBlock crop) {&#10;                        int age = state.getValue(CropBlock.AGE);&#10;                        int maxAge = crop.getMaxAge();&#10;                        if (age < maxAge && world.getRandom().nextFloat() < 0.25f) {&#10;                            world.setBlock(targetPos, state.setValue(CropBlock.AGE, age + 1), 2);&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;&#10;                    // Nether Wart&#10;                    else if (state.getBlock() instanceof NetherWartBlock) {&#10;                        int age = state.getValue(NetherWartBlock.AGE);&#10;                        if (age < 3 && world.getRandom().nextFloat() < 0.25f) {&#10;                            world.setBlock(targetPos, state.setValue(NetherWartBlock.AGE, age + 1), 2);&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;                    &#10;                    // Sugar Cane & Cactus (age property goes 0â€“15, grows at 15)&#10;                    else if (state.hasProperty(net.minecraft.world.level.block.SugarCaneBlock.AGE)) {&#10;                        int age = state.getValue(net.minecraft.world.level.block.SugarCaneBlock.AGE);&#10;                        if (age < 15 && world.getRandom().nextFloat() < 0.25f) {&#10;                            world.setBlock(targetPos, state.setValue(net.minecraft.world.level.block.SugarCaneBlock.AGE, age + 1), 2);&#10;                        }&#10;                    } else if (state.hasProperty(net.minecraft.world.level.block.CactusBlock.AGE)) {&#10;                        int age = state.getValue(net.minecraft.world.level.block.CactusBlock.AGE);&#10;                        if (age < 15 && world.getRandom().nextFloat() < 0.25f) {&#10;                            world.setBlock(targetPos, state.setValue(net.minecraft.world.level.block.CactusBlock.AGE, age + 1), 2);&#10;                        }&#10;                    }&#10;                }&#10;            }&#10;        }&#10;    }&#10;}&#10;</field></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="controls_repeat_ext" x="818" y="123"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="block_schedule_tick"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></xml>
